content:
Hey folks, I'm working on updating the "type inference variables" section on the rustc-dev-guide, here's the current: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/type-inference.html#inference-variables
it says we have four variables but if my understanding is correct, we also have const variables after #59008, right? I guess it's the only part to update but if there is anything I've missed, please let me know, thanks!

I've created a PR for it: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/1145
I'd appreciate it if someone familiar with the area reviews it :)
